author: Donna Clouse
comment: Will not work. Keeps saying to set on watch first but does not appear on the watch to be able to do so.

author: Alexandra Arrieta
comment: Great for simple customization. It would be nice to be able to add one or two complications though.

author: James Shand
comment: It won't let me put it on my watch which is kinda the point so...
I'll say only one more word AWESOME

author: Johnny D
comment: It doesn't work with custom images. When I select my own image and set it on my watch, my watch will blink for a few seconds, then switch to a blank watch face called "Simple". I can use Willow's stock backgrounds, but I cannot use my own. What's the point of allowing custom images then?

author: Mari Medrano
comment: Great photos for watch face. You can add your own, customize to some degree how the time, etc. appears, and cool fonts available. #realhip

author: Maria Monti
comment: Love that I can use my own pictures on my watch face. It was easy to use. I wish there were more options for moving the placement of the time or cropping of the picture.

author: Calin Valentin Carpen
comment: THIS DOESNT WORK ON THE SAMSUNG GEAR FOR EXAMPLE I AM NOT USING ANDROID WEAR OR WHATEVER IT IS CALLED IM USING SAMSUNG GEAR AND IT DOESNT WORK -5 STARs!!

author: Denya Lanzini
comment: I love being able to customise my watch face and match it to my phone.

author: Luke Earnshaw
comment: App is great worked straight away with custom watch picture

author: John Hummels
comment: Awesome app!  Works great with your own photos!

author: Aziz alshammaliab
comment: 4 stars because it don't resized the photos

author: Dennis Eagar
comment: Does what it says it's supposed to do!

author: Balasubramaniam Ramaswamy
comment: Very useful app to display an image from your collection.

author: Ryan Tsui
comment: Consider allowing user to remove added photos

author: Tom Robledo
comment: So far so good!

author: Amr Al-Omari
comment: It's amazing

author: magical beauty
comment: it's great it's great it's great

author: Amanpreet K
comment: Nice

author: Judith Mueller
comment: So far I like it very much. I would really like to be able to show things like the battery percentage and temperature and moon phase as well as the time though. Maybe I just haven't found out how to do that yet. I just downloaded it last night. I love being able to put my own pictures on it and I very much like the variety of pictures that come with the app as well. When you choose a picture it loads instantly. Very nice. 🙂

author: Kody H
comment: One of the best watch face apps ever in my opinion, would get a five star rating but the app seems to lack the most simple tool ever when setting a photo as anything, resizing. I would love to put a photo of my girlfriend on my watch but the watch will only show the bottom of the photo and there is no way to resize the image at all. Real shame.

author: Tiffany Dreyer
comment: It never worked on my galaxy s7. I recently upgraded to the galaxy s8+ and it still doesn't connect.  It just sits on the synchronizing.  I really wanted it to work. Gave up. Uninstalling.

author: Eleanor Fay
comment: I really like this app, I have made some great watch faces with it. It has a great variety of fonts. I wish it had a color wheel so you could choose any color font instead of the few options given though. It would also be cool if it had a way to save a specific picture and font combination as a watch face that you could choose again. I would pay to have those features added.

author: Shawn D'Costa
comment: Great, but only 1 main thing for me missing. Can I suggest you add watch battery percentage just below the date or above the time or customise where to place it. After that will give a full 5 star rating.

author: Sachin Patil
comment: I like this app its works superb, I will recommend this to friends too. but I have some suggestions. 1. Allow to change uploaded photo position. Like if I have big image so allow to resize it or allow to set center of image in watch dial portion. 2. Give more options to set time, day and date part display.

author: Izak Santana
comment: This is probably the coolest watch face maker I've come across. It would be perfect if you could choose any color for fonts and if there were some kind of seconds feature! Great job.

author: Tamara Kot
comment: Love it! I love you can add your own photo for watch face. Different colors and types of font is wonderful as well!

author: Nikolas Fleming
comment: Great app and excellent support! Needed some help with initial setup on my particular watch and emails were responded to quickly, with the answers I needed.

author: Phil Jeffes
comment: Excellent watch face. Submitted bug to developer and they responded very quickly. Thanks :)

author: Preetam Datta
comment: Please add complication support for Android Wear 2.0

author: Amogh Phadke
comment: Doesnt work on asus zenwatch 2... Keeps syncing... Drained watch battery

author: A. DesPaw
comment: I really like the app, and used it for a while. But the only reason I have it 4 stars is because for some reason I can't set it to low bit mode.

author: Prithviraj Singh Gohil
comment: A very simple and light apk. But what it needs is an ability to cycle wallpapers automatically on regular intervals from it's gallery
This app sucks. I installed it on my S8+ and it does literally nothing. Don't waste your time.

author: Filipe Governa
comment: Good watchface, but no full-color ambient mode, no hourly sound/vibration, and no weather information. Good support.

author: Tim Buck
comment: Would love to see more widget support. <3

author: maxah 247
comment: best ever watch face , tested on LG g watch , you can even put your photos on screen

author: Ann Sanders
comment: Love all your faces for my watch.......I would really love a cross with a scene of Jesus Christ.

author: Rene Haberman
comment: I wish you could move the time...i don't like it in the middle of the face.

author: Millionaire In London
comment: Wish it could show batt life but so far it does the job customize to how u like it
